001
002package com.commercetools.ml.defaultconfig;
003
004import java.net.URI;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.function.Function;
007import java.util.function.Supplier;
008
009import javax.annotation.Nullable;
010
011import com.commercetools.ml.client.ApiRoot;
012import com.commercetools.ml.client.ByProjectKeyRequestBuilder;
013import com.commercetools.ml.client.ProjectApiRoot;
014
015import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
016import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.HttpExceptionFactory;
017import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.*;
018import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.ClientCredentials;
019import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.TokenSupplier;
020
021public class MLApiRootBuilder {
022    private final ClientBuilder builder;
023
024    private MLApiRootBuilder(ClientBuilder builder) {
025        this.builder = builder;
026    }
027
028    public static MLApiRootBuilder of() {
029        return new MLApiRootBuilder(ClientBuilder.of());
030    }
031
032    public static MLApiRootBuilder of(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
033        return new MLApiRootBuilder(ClientBuilder.of(httpClient));
034    }
035
036    public static MLApiRootBuilder of(final HandlerStack stack) {
037        return new MLApiRootBuilder(ClientBuilder.of(stack));
038    }
039
040    public MLApiRootBuilder withAuthCircuitBreaker() {
041        builder.withAuthCircuitBreaker();
042        return this;
043    }
044
045    public MLApiRootBuilder withoutAuthCircuitBreaker() {
046        builder.withoutAuthCircuitBreaker();
047        return this;
048    }
049
050    public MLApiRootBuilder withAuthRetries(final int authRetries) {
051        builder.withAuthRetries(authRetries);
052        return this;
053    }
054
055    public MLApiRootBuilder withHandlerStack(final HandlerStack stack) {
056        builder.withHandlerStack(stack);
057        return this;
058    }
059
060    public MLApiRootBuilder withHttpClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
061        builder.withHttpClient(httpClient);
062        return this;
063    }
064
065    public MLApiRootBuilder withSerializer(final ResponseSerializer serializer) {
066        builder.withSerializer(serializer);
067        return this;
068    }
069
070    public MLApiRootBuilder withSerializer(final Supplier<ResponseSerializer> serializer) {
071        builder.withSerializer(serializer);
072        return this;
073    }
074
075    public MLApiRootBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final HttpExceptionFactory factory) {
076        builder.withHttpExceptionFactory(factory);
077        return this;
078    }
079
080    public MLApiRootBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Function<ResponseSerializer, HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
081        builder.withHttpExceptionFactory(factory);
082        return this;
083    }
084
085    public MLApiRootBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Supplier<HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
086        builder.withHttpExceptionFactory(factory);
087        return this;
088    }
089
090    public MLApiRootBuilder defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials) {
091        return defaultClient(credentials, ServiceRegion.GCP_EUROPE);
092    }
093
094    public MLApiRootBuilder defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials, ServiceRegionConfig serviceRegion) {
095        builder.defaultClient(credentials, serviceRegion);
096
097        return this;
098    }
099
100    public MLApiRootBuilder defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
101            final String apiEndpoint) {
102        return this.defaultClient(URI.create(apiEndpoint)).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
103    }
104
105    public MLApiRootBuilder defaultClient(final String apiEndpoint, final ClientCredentials credentials,
106            final String tokenEndpoint) {
107        return this.defaultClient(URI.create(apiEndpoint)).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
108    }
109
110    public MLApiRootBuilder defaultClient(final String apiEndpoint) {
111        return this.defaultClient(URI.create(apiEndpoint));
112    }
113
114    public MLApiRootBuilder defaultClient(final URI apiEndpoint) {
115        builder.defaultClient(apiEndpoint);
116
117        return this;
118    }
119
120    public MLApiRootBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
121        builder.withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
122
123        return this;
124    }
125
126    public MLApiRootBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
127            final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
128        builder.withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
129
130        return this;
131    }
132
133    public MLApiRootBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint) {
134        builder.withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
135
136        return this;
137    }
138
139    public MLApiRootBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint,
140            final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
141        builder.withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
142
143        return this;
144    }
145
146    public MLApiRootBuilder withStaticTokenFlow(final AuthenticationToken token) {
147        builder.withStaticTokenFlow(token);
148
149        return this;
150    }
151
152    public MLApiRootBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
153        builder.withAnonymousSessionFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
154
155        return this;
156    }
157
158    public MLApiRootBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
159            final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
160        builder.withAnonymousSessionFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
161
162        return this;
163    }
164
165    public MLApiRootBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
166            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint) {
167        builder.withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint);
168
169        return this;
170    }
171
172    public MLApiRootBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
173            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
174        builder.withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
175
176        return this;
177    }
178
179    public MLApiRootBuilder addAcceptGZipMiddleware() {
180        builder.addAcceptGZipMiddleware();
181
182        return this;
183    }
184
185    public MLApiRootBuilder withErrorMiddleware() {
186        builder.withErrorMiddleware();
187
188        return this;
189    }
190
191    public MLApiRootBuilder withErrorMiddleware(final ErrorMiddleware errorMiddleware) {
192        builder.withErrorMiddleware(errorMiddleware);
193
194        return this;
195    }
196
197    public MLApiRootBuilder withRetryMiddleware(Supplier<RetryMiddleware> retryMiddleware) {
198        builder.withRetryMiddleware(retryMiddleware);
199
200        return this;
201    }
202
203    public MLApiRootBuilder withRetryMiddleware(RetryMiddleware retryMiddleware) {
204        builder.withRetryMiddleware(retryMiddleware);
205
206        return this;
207    }
208
209    public MLApiRootBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries) {
210        builder.withRetryMiddleware(maxRetries);
211
212        return this;
213    }
214
215    public MLApiRootBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, List<Integer> statusCodes) {
216        builder.withRetryMiddleware(maxRetries, statusCodes);
217
218        return this;
219    }
220
221    public MLApiRootBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final Supplier<OAuthMiddleware> oAuthMiddleware) {
222        builder.withOAuthMiddleware(oAuthMiddleware);
223
224        return this;
225    }
226
227    public MLApiRootBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final OAuthMiddleware oAuthMiddleware) {
228        builder.withOAuthMiddleware(oAuthMiddleware);
229
230        return this;
231    }
232
233    public MLApiRootBuilder withTokenSupplier(final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier) {
234        builder.withTokenSupplier(tokenSupplier);
235
236        return this;
237    }
238
239    public MLApiRootBuilder withTokenSupplier(final Supplier<TokenSupplier> tokenSupplier) {
240        builder.withTokenSupplier(tokenSupplier);
241
242        return this;
243    }
244
245    public MLApiRootBuilder withInternalLoggerMiddleware(final InternalLoggerMiddleware internalLoggerMiddleware) {
246        builder.withInternalLoggerMiddleware(internalLoggerMiddleware);
247
248        return this;
249    }
250
251    public MLApiRootBuilder withInternalLoggerFactory(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory) {
252        builder.withInternalLoggerFactory(internalLoggerFactory);
253
254        return this;
255    }
256
257    public MLApiRootBuilder withApiBaseUrl(String apiBaseUrl) {
258        builder.withApiBaseUrl(apiBaseUrl);
259
260        return this;
261    }
262
263    public MLApiRootBuilder withApiBaseUrl(final URI apiBaseUrl) {
264        builder.withApiBaseUrl(apiBaseUrl);
265
266        return this;
267    }
268
269    public MLApiRootBuilder withUserAgentSupplier(final Supplier<String> userAgentSupplier) {
270        builder.withUserAgentSupplier(userAgentSupplier);
271
272        return this;
273    }
274
275    public MLApiRootBuilder addCorrelationIdProvider(final @Nullable CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
276        builder.addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider);
277
278        return this;
279    }
280
281    public MLApiRootBuilder withMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
282        builder.withMiddleware(middleware, middlewares);
283
284        return this;
285    }
286
287    public MLApiRootBuilder addMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
288        builder.addMiddleware(middleware, middlewares);
289
290        return this;
291    }
292
293    public MLApiRootBuilder withMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
294        builder.withMiddlewares(middlewares);
295
296        return this;
297    }
298
299    public MLApiRootBuilder addMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
300        builder.addMiddlewares(middlewares);
301
302        return this;
303    }
304
305    public ApiRoot build() {
306        return ApiRoot.fromClient(clientSupplier().get());
307    }
308
309    public ApiHttpClient buildClient() {
310        return clientSupplier().get();
311    }
312
313    public Supplier<ApiHttpClient> clientSupplier() {
314        return builder::build;
315    }
316
317    /**
318     * @deprecated use {@link #build(String)}  instead
319     */
320    @Deprecated
321    public ByProjectKeyRequestBuilder buildForProject(final String projectKey) {
322        return ApiRoot.fromClient(builder.build()).withProjectKey(projectKey);
323    }
324
325    /**
326     * @deprecated use {@link #build(String)}  instead
327     */
328    @Deprecated
329    public ProjectApiRoot buildProjectRoot(final String projectKey) {
330        return ProjectApiRoot.fromClient(projectKey, builder.build());
331    }
332
333    public ProjectApiRoot build(final String projectKey) {
334        return ProjectApiRoot.fromClient(projectKey, builder.build());
335    }
336}
